description: Random weight initialization for Mockingjay replacement policy

features.name: pc_hash
features.description: Hash of program counter, indicates access pattern

features.name: age
features.description: Time since insertion, older blocks may be stale

features.name: access_count
features.description: Number of accesses, negative means frequently accessed blocks have lower eviction priority

features.name: reuse_distance
features.description: Distance since last access, larger distance suggests lower reuse

notes: Random initialization allows the model to learn from scratch during online training
